For the poor souls who have to do these kinds of hacks, it would be very helpful to know that `site_packages_dir` is a thing.

Please advise on what the wording for each of `site_packages_dir`, `PYTHONHOME`, and `PYTHONPATH` should actually say.  More specifically, are there any actual use cases of when `PYTHONHOME` or `PYTHONPATH` have had to be used?
